abstract.p: World Business Briefing: Toshiba Corp earned 53.9 billion yen ($498 million) on revenue of 2.8 trillion yen ($25.8 billion) for six months ended Sept 30 compared with loss of 48.5 billion yen ($448 million) for first half of last year (S)

block.p: Toshiba said it earned 53.9 billion yen ($498 million) on revenue of 2.8 trillion yen ($25.8 billion) for the six months that ended Sept. 30. Toshiba said that rising sales in chips, PC's and other information devices helped it turn around from a group net loss of 48.5 billion yen ($448 million) for the first half of last year. The manufacturer said it expected to report a full-year profit of 137 billion ($1.3 billion) yen on sales of 6.2 trillion yen ($57.3 billion).
